version_description:
We update our app regularly to make it even better for you to easily connect to the people that matter. Update to the latest version to get all the new features and improvements. This release includes:

- New TV/Movies to Watch Together. Grab your favourite snacks and message your friends!

- fixes for crashes within calling experiences

- improvements to video calling quality

Have a question? Tap Help in the Messenger app or visit facebook.com/help/messenger-app

我们会定期推出应用更新，让应用变得更加完善。下载最新版本，即可体验 Messenger 已开放的所有功能。该版本修复了若干漏洞，并对性能进行了优化提升。感谢使用 Messenger！
我们会定期推出应用更新，让应用变得更加完善。下载最新版本，即可体验 Messenger 已开放的所有功能。该版本修复了若干漏洞，并对性能进行了优化提升。感谢使用 Messenger！

More ways to connect – Message or call friends on Instagram straight from Messenger.

Opt in to vanish mode where seen messages disappear after you exit the chat.

More ways to connect – Message or call friends on Instagram straight from Messenger.

Opt in to vanish mode where seen messages disappear after you exit the chat.
新功能！Messenger 视频聊天推出新功能“一起看”，一定适合喜爱边看边聊的你们！
Messenger 推出全新功能应用锁，防止不相关人士查看你的消息内容。开启应用锁以后，使用设备上的面容 ID 或触控 ID 才能解锁 Messenger，因此只有你才能看到自己的聊天内容。
我们在 Messenger 设置菜单里面加入了隐私设置版块，方便你对自己的隐私设置进行管理。这些隐私设置包括黑名单、消息设置、私密对话、快拍分享对象和不看的快拍。
我们会定期推出应用更新，让应用变得更加完善。下载最新版本，即可体验 Messenger 已开放的所有功能。该版本修复了若干漏洞，并对性能进行了优化提升。感谢使用 Messenger！

This version includes bug fixes, as well as some new sticker features.

Thanks for using Messenger!

In efforts to make it easier to connect with businesses on Messenger, we are focusing on more contextual ways to connect with businesses, such as the search feature and advertising surfaces. Thanks for using Messenger!

Thanks for using Messenger!

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features.  This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!
本次更新发布后，您将能直接在 Messenger 对话中看见好友发布的快拍，对方也能看见您的快拍！Messenger 希望为您打造更丰富、更有意义的对话体验，帮助您加深与亲友的联系。

Thanks for using Messenger!

We are working on improving the Messenger app experience. During this time, you may experience a more streamlined app, as well as some feature changes along the way.

Thanks for using Messenger!

- Messenger Rooms is a new way to hang out with your favourite people on video chat. Create and share a link, and anyone can join, even if they don't have a Facebook account. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.
- Polls are back! Now it's even easier to coordinate with your group.

We are working on improving the Messenger app experience. During this time, you may experience a more streamlined app, as well as some feature changes along the way.

Thanks for using Messenger!

In this update, you can now see your friends' Messenger Stories right inside your chat thread, and they can see yours, too! Messenger wants you to build better, more meaningful conversations with your friends and family.

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!
我们计划在短期内推出一系列新功能，例如渐变颜色、全新设计的界面皮肤。该版本将在未来几周内逐步推出，请别走开，很快就能与你见面哦！這個版本修復了一些故障及改善效能。感謝你愛用 Messenger！

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!

我们计划在短期内推出一系列新功能，例如渐变颜色、全新设计的界面皮肤。该版本将在未来几周内逐步推出，请别走开，很快就能与你见面哦！這個版本修復了一些故障及改善效能。感謝你愛用 Messenger！

新功能即将上线：移除某个聊天对话中已发出的消息。如果你不小心错发了照片等信息，或是找错了聊天对象，只要发送时间没有超过 10 分钟，即可移除消息，轻松化解尴尬！

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。
新鲜出炉的渐变式气泡颜色，让对话活色生香！
Search results will now display conversations in addition to people and business results.

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.

Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

In this update, you can now see your friends' Messenger Stories right inside your chat thread, and they can see yours, too! Messenger wants you to build better, more meaningful conversations with your friends and family.
Search results will now display conversations in addition to people and business results.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features.  This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。
新鲜出炉的渐变式气泡颜色，让对话活色生香！

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。
新鲜出炉的渐变式气泡颜色，让对话活色生香！

- improvements to video calling quality

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。
新鲜出炉的渐变式气泡颜色，让对话活色生香！

- improvements to video calling quality

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Thanks for using Messenger!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

我们计划在短期内推出一系列新功能，例如渐变颜色、全新设计的界面皮肤。该版本将在未来几周内逐步推出，请别走开，很快就能与你见面哦！這個版本修復了一些故障及改善效能。感謝你愛用 Messenger！

新功能即将上线：移除某个聊天对话中已发出的消息。如果你不小心错发了照片等信息，或是找错了聊天对象，只要发送时间没有超过 10 分钟，即可移除消息，轻松化解尴尬！

Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

he brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Explore.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Explore tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger 应用经过全新设计，现在闪亮登场啦！不仅仅是多一点方便、多一点简单，还增添了更多趣味元素哦！
应用布局现已浓缩成三大选项卡：用户、对话和发现。
- “对话”选项卡中存放着你的所有消息（一对一聊天和群聊）、视频通话、语音通话，方便你快速查看，此外，你还可以在此使用相机功能，好友的快拍也放在这里啦！
- “用户”选项卡中存放着你的新老好友。
- “发现”选项卡帮助你与最喜爱的品牌建立联系，你可以在这里发现折扣商品、玩游戏，探索更多精彩内容。
新鲜出炉的渐变式气泡颜色，让对话活色生香！

Messenger 推出全新功能应用锁，防止不相关人士查看你的消息内容。开启应用锁以后，使用设备上的面容 ID 或触控 ID 才能解锁 Messenger，因此只有你才能看到自己的聊天内容。

我们会定期推出应用更新，让应用变得更加完善。下载最新版本，即可体验 Messenger 已开放的所有功能。该版本修复了若干漏洞，并对性能进行了优化提升。感谢使用 Messenger！

New! on Messenger:

A new look and more ways to connect with friends.
Watch videos together with friends over Messenger video chat.
React using any emoji with custom reactions.
Customise your chats with fun themes and colours, such as Tie-dye or Halloween.
新功能！Messenger 视频聊天推出新功能“一起看”，一定适合喜爱边看边聊的你们！
新功能！Messenger 视频聊天推出新功能“一起看”，一定适合喜爱边看边聊的你们！
Messenger 推出全新功能应用锁，防止不相关人士查看你的消息内容。开启应用锁以后，使用设备上的面容 ID 或触控 ID 才能解锁 Messenger，因此只有你才能看到自己的聊天内容。
我们会定期推出应用更新，让应用变得更加完善。下载最新版本，即可体验 Messenger 已开放的所有功能。该版本修复了若干漏洞，并对性能进行了优化提升。感谢使用 Messenger！
Messenger 更新了爱心图标，方便用户在宅家期间向好友表达更多关爱。
Messenger 推出全新功能应用锁，防止不相关人士查看你的消息内容。开启应用锁以后，使用设备上的面容 ID 或触控 ID 才能解锁 Messenger，因此只有你才能看到自己的聊天内容。

- Messenger Rooms is a new way to hang out with your favourite people on video chat. Create and share a link, and anyone can join, even if they don't have a Facebook account. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.
- Polls are back! Now it's even easier to coordinate with your group.
Messenger 应用已彻底重新构建。新版 Messenger 更轻量、更快速，更方便使用！大小降至原来的 1/4，启动速度增至两倍，新功能仍将随时发布！

We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!

In efforts to make it easier to connect with businesses on Messenger, we are focusing on more contextual ways to connect with businesses, such as the search feature and advertising surfaces. Thanks for using Messenger!

We are working on improving the Messenger app experience. During this time, you may experience a more streamlined app, as well as some feature changes along the way.

Thanks for using Messenger!

- Messenger Rooms is a new way to hang out with your favourite people on video chat. Create and share a link, and anyone can join, even if they don't have a Facebook account. Host up to 50 people with no time limits.
- Polls are back! Now it's even easier to coordinate with your group.

In this update, you can now see your friends' Messenger Stories right inside your chat thread, and they can see yours, too! Messenger wants you to build better, more meaningful conversations with your friends and family.

In this update, you can now see your friends' Messenger Stories right inside your chat thread, and they can see yours, too! Messenger wants you to build better, more meaningful conversations with your friends and family.

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!

In this update, you can now see your friends' Messenger Stories right inside your chat thread, and they can see yours, too! Messenger wants you to build better, more meaningful conversations with your friends and family.

Messenger is launching a handful of exciting updates to our camera experience. In this update, take even better pictures of yourself with the new Selfie Mode. Take a fun Boomerang to send to your friends. Add fun stickers to your Stories, and even add face filters and effects after you've taken a photo. Thanks for using Messenger!

The brand new, redesigned Messenger app is now easier to use, simpler to navigate and more fun.
Messenger has been simplified into three tabs—People, Chat and Discover.
-Chat tab lets you quickly access all your messages (1:1 and groups), video chat, call, use the camera and even catch up on friends' Stories.
-People tab helps you find friends, both new and old.
-Discover tab connects you to your favorite brands, find discounts, play games and more in explore.
Plus, new color gradients make your chat more colorful too!
